headline: Emergent Brings Salesforce and Agentforce Solutions to Federal Agencies Through GSA Contract Vehicle Access
summary: Emergent, LLC, a solutions provider well known in the Public Sector for providing transformational technology strategies to Federal and State & Local customers, announced that they have successfully added Salesforce solutions and services to it's active GSA Contract, effective August 7, 2025. Federal agencies looking to procure Salesforce technology solutions, including Agentforce — Salesforce's trusted AI platform for smarter services and streamlined workflows — through GSA can now work with ou

headline: Salesforce (CRM) Enhances Agentforce With Seismic's AI For Improved Sales Productivity
summary: Salesforce (CRM) experienced a 4% increase over the last week, a move that contrasts with the broader market's 1.5% decline. This performance may be linked to Seismic's announcement of AI-driven enhancements integrated within Salesforce, aimed at boosting productivity and sales outcomes. These collaborative advancements came at a time when broader market sentiments were subdued, partly due to anticipation surrounding Fed Chair Powell's economic insights. The company's notable AI initiatives...

headline: Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire Regrello
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is included in our list of the 10 Most Oversold AI Stocks to Buy Now. On August 18, 2025, Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) signed a definitive agreement to acquire Regrello, an AI-native platform that transforms business data into agile, agentic workflows. This acquisition is expected to close in the company’s third fiscal quarter […]

headline: Oracle Rides Major Deals With OpenAI, Nvidia to Turn Around Cloud Business
summary: Now, the success of Oracle’s cloud infrastructure unit is why the company’s stock price has soared and made Ellison, its chairman and co-founder, the second-richest person in the world.  Oracle, a software company that had long struggled to find its niche in this market, gained a foothold through scoring major customers.  Today, it’s helping power Elon Musk’s xAI from a data center in Utah, assembling a cluster of tens of thousands of AI chips for Nvidia Corp. near Singapore and recently inked what is likely the largest single cloud deal ever with OpenAI, the leading artificial intelligence company.
